about_the_game:
The Vestigial Princess is a DLC that offers a new piece to the overarching story that ties House of Velez and Grave Prosperity together. It is also a look at how a 3D Grave Prosperity Remake could potentially play on UE4. This DLC is primarily meant to test the waters for the latter.

Take on the role of the "Vestigial Princess" and endure the twisted machination of a familiar antagonist.
Solve deadly puzzles and fend off disturbing creatures with a combination of hack n slash combat, OTS gunplay, and supernatural powers, all while piecing together the clues of your identity that are scattered about the area.

NOTE
For users who wish to use a PS4 controller: you will need to have a 3rd party software in order for the game to recognize its inputs. I have included an option in-game to replace the on-screen tutorials with PS4 button mapping in case you don't want to play with keyboard/mouse or can't use an XBox controller.
The DS4Windows software works perfectly with UE4, is free, and requires no set up at all. Just open the program and then open the game and you're good to go!

content_descriptors.notes: This game depicts scenes of extreme violence and gore, nudity, and makes open references to sexual abuse and self-harm.

detailed_description:
The Vestigial Princess is a DLC that offers a new piece to the overarching story that ties House of Velez and Grave Prosperity together. It is also a look at how a 3D Grave Prosperity Remake could potentially play on UE4. This DLC is primarily meant to test the waters for the latter.

Take on the role of the "Vestigial Princess" and endure the twisted machination of a familiar antagonist.
Solve deadly puzzles and fend off disturbing creatures with a combination of hack n slash combat, OTS gunplay, and supernatural powers, all while piecing together the clues of your identity that are scattered about the area.

NOTE
For users who wish to use a PS4 controller: you will need to have a 3rd party software in order for the game to recognize its inputs. I have included an option in-game to replace the on-screen tutorials with PS4 button mapping in case you don't want to play with keyboard/mouse or can't use an XBox controller.
The DS4Windows software works perfectly with UE4, is free, and requires no set up at all. Just open the program and then open the game and you're good to go!
name: Grave Prosperity - The Vestigial Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
